etymologies: mid 17th century: from astragalus, partly via French astragale

definitions: a convex molding or wooden strip across a surface or separating panels, typically semicircular in cross-section.
shortDefinitions: convex molding or wooden strip across surface or separating panels

definitions: a small semicircular molding around the top or bottom of a column.
shortDefinitions: small semicircular molding around top or bottom of column

definitions: a wooden molding that covers the gap between a pair of doors or casement windows.
shortDefinitions: wooden molding that covers gap between pair of doors

definitions: a glazing bar, typically one used in cabinetmaking.
